ygData.subject: Re: Interview with Geoffrey Zatkin
ygData.msgSnippet: I had always assumed that the stun during Divine Aura was a bug and not to maintain balance.  I thought the balance was kept by this spell in that it could
ygData.messageBody:
I had always assumed that the stun during Divine Aura was a bug and not to
maintain balance. I thought the balance was kept by this spell in that it
could only be used once every 15 minutes. Even if you die and have to
rememorize it, you still have to wait the 15 minutes to use it again. If
this stun thing isn't a bug, then I probably won't use this spell more. I
hardly use it now as it is since the only time I really need it is if I'm
going to die and I have no hope of running since I'm so low on life anyways.
Although it is fun to cast this spell then jump off of things such as the
wizard teleport stones. Always fun to scare people. Hehe.

-Rydel on Bristlebane
